Detailed Description

The class to display the 3D view for a molecule and navigate into this 3D view.



As it uses VSEPRMolecule3D to render the molecule, the root atom passed to this class must * NEVER be an hydrogen (see VSEPRMolecule3D for more details, this class is used quite the same way).

See also:
VSEPRMolecule3D

VSEPRMolecule
